title: Manage Maintenance Parts Inventory
description: A mechanic uses a part (e.g., a filter) for a repair. The inventory system must be updated, and the part reordered if stock is low.

tasks.description: A mechanic scans the barcode of a part as they use it on a repair order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The part is added to the repair order, and inventory is deducted.

tasks.description: The system checks the new on-hand quantity for the part against its reorder point.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system sees the quantity has fallen below the reorder point.

tasks.description: The system automatically generates a purchase order for the part from the designated supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: A PO is created to replenish the stock.
